rules_text:
The first time you would draw a card on each of your turns, instead scry 2, then draw a card.
The first time you tap a land for mana on each of your turns, add {G}{G}.
The first time a creature you control dies on each of your turns, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
notes:
Only your turn as per Zangy?
